name: bookkeeper-finder
description: Find certified bookkeepers and CPAs instantly
long_description: BookkeeperFinder is an MCP server that helps AI agents and users find verified, certified bookkeepers and CPAs. All professionals are verified with state licensing boards and include real reviews. Perfect for small businesses, real estate investors, and anyone who needs reliable accounting services.
